meanings.definition: The state of being a member.
meanings.sent1: Her memberships in the club and team make her feel included.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy the benefits of gym memberships.
meanings.sent3: His memberships in various organizations keep him busy but happy.
meanings.sent4: The memberships in the exclusive club grant access to a world of luxury.
meanings.sent5: The memberships in the group give a sense of belonging and unity.

meanings.definition: The number or body of members in a group.
meanings.sent1: The memberships of the team have grown significantly this year.
meanings.sent2: The memberships of the organization are steadily increasing.
meanings.sent3: The memberships of the book club ensure lively discussions.
meanings.sent4: The memberships of the choir create harmonious performances.
meanings.sent5: The memberships of the committee bring diverse perspectives together.

meanings.definition: The rights and privileges of a member.
meanings.sent1: With her memberships, she can attend all the events for free.
meanings.sent2: The memberships come with exclusive discounts and perks.
meanings.sent3: His memberships allow him to access special areas in the building.
meanings.sent4: The memberships provide VIP treatment at the venue.
meanings.sent5: The memberships offer unique opportunities for personal growth.
